  2. Apple Sued By Its Own Shareholder Over Siri AI Feature Delay, Allegedly Misled Investors With Fake WWDC Demo, Causing Stock To Crash Nearly 13 Percent  Wccftech
  3. Apple shareholders sue over Apple Intelligence and Siri delays  9to5Mac
  4. AAPL Investors Have Opportunity to Lead Apple Inc. Securities Fraud Lawsuit with the Schall Law Firm  Business Wire
  5. Pomerantz Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Against Apple Inc. and Certain Officers - AAPL  The Victoria Advocate

item.title: Longtime IBM Executive to Lead Davis Institute for Artificial Intelligence - Colby News
item.description: Longtime IBM Executive to Lead Davis Institute for Artificial Intelligence  Colby News

item.title: BBC threatens AI firm with legal action over unauthorised content use - BBC
item.description:
1. BBC threatens AI firm with legal action over unauthorised content use  BBC
  2. BBC threatens legal action against AI startup Perplexity over content scraping, FT reports  Reuters
  3. BBC threatens legal action against AI startup over content scraping  The Guardian
  4. BBC Threatens to Sue Perplexity, Alleging 'Verbatim' Reproduction of Its Content  Yahoo
  5. BBC sues Perplexity for content theft as Apple considers buying the AI outfit  Fudzilla.com
